QuestData.Title: Shooting the Breeze
QuestData.Description: Kia and I are having a spirited debate over who kills more efficiently: SI:7 or rangari.$B$BCare to get in on the wager, commander?$B$BI've been focusing on talbuk because of their fierce majesty. They truly encapsulate the grandeur of Nagrand as any native of Draenor knows.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Breezestrider Horns from Breezestrider talbuk.
QuestData.CompletionText: This outsider really thinks she can come here and best me in my own land?$B$BOh... sorry, commander. Present company excluded, of course.
QuestData.RewardText: Twenty-four, huh? That's fine work.$B$BI brought back fifty.$B$BI'll send someone out for the meat. Waste not, want not.
